content.title: Peacemakers
content.description: What's the impact of a dollar?

content.header1: What is the impact of a dollar?
content.text1: Your donation, no matter how small, can make a huge impact in fostering peace and compassion in our community and beyond. Donate today and inviting your friends, family, and colleagues to join us in making a difference. Let's make the world a better place, one dollar at a time.

button1.description: a link to a donation page.

content.text1: When we partner organizations like MCC, we increase the impact made in addressing complex global issues. Collaborating with MCC can result in more cost effective and long-term solutions to complex global issues.

image1.alt: Girl wearing a head covering holding a hand drawn picture of her violent environment.

content.text1: Give to MCC's Peacemakers campaign to foster peace. Here we can track how many dollars will be making an impact through MCC this year.
